meanings.definition: The cultivation of trees and shrubs.
meanings.sent1: Arboriculture involves planting and growing trees in a garden.
meanings.sent2: She studied arboriculture to learn how to care for the trees in the park.
meanings.sent3: The arboriculture class had a competition to see who could grow the tallest tree.
meanings.sent4: In the world of arboriculture, each tree is like a unique work of art.
meanings.sent5: His passion for arboriculture was evident in the lush greenery surrounding his home.

meanings.definition: The study of the care and maintenance of trees and shrubs.
meanings.sent1: Learning about arboriculture helps in keeping trees healthy and strong.
meanings.sent2: The arboriculture expert advised pruning the branches to improve tree health.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to be conducting its own arboriculture experiments in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to arboriculture made her the go-to person for tree care advice.
meanings.sent5: The arboriculture workshop provided valuable insights into tree maintenance techniques.
